name: DVD Screen: The Video Game
description:
Ever wanted to go back and relive your childhood memories of watching that good ol' DVD logo bounce around the four corners of your television? Now you can, and more! With DVD Screen: The Video Game, all your nostalgic whims will be fulfilled! 

To control the game, simply tap the X button whenever the logo hits a wall. Missing a bounce will dock you one heart, and losing all 3 will result in a game over. Get 10 hits in a row to advance each level and earn a streak! Streaks give you more points than normal, and add a bit of spice to your DVD Screen: The Video Game experience.
